video_description: Today Tonight interviews Ruslan Kogan (http://www.kogan.com/au/) and features Australia's best value tablet, the Kogan Agora 7" Tablet.
title: Today Tonight features the Kogan Agora 7" Tablet (15/07/2011)

comments.text:
I have one of the Kogan 7" tablets and it's brilliant! When it comes to bang for buck it just can't be beaten. Of there are a few 'issues' such e.g. no Bluetooth and a pretty shabby battery life of around 3 hours at full tilt. Even so, for the price... nothing matches it.

At the very *least* you'll be trying out a 7" format to be able to decide if the﻿ screen is large enough for you to use (which I'd say it is) without shelling out hundreds of dollars for something that in the end you don't use!
comments.author: Chris Lewis
